headline: AutoZone (AZO): Examining Valuation as Tariff Impact Drives LIFO Charges and Management Signals Confident Outlook
summary: AutoZone (AZO) recently highlighted the financial impact of tariffs, reporting an $80 million non-cash LIFO charge in the previous quarter. The company now expects this charge to rise to $120 million. The company’s leadership remains confident about customer demand despite higher prices. See our latest analysis for AutoZone. Despite some recent pressure on AutoZone’s share price, with a decline of 9.35% over the past month following news of higher LIFO charges, the company’s long-term...
